body:
Hmm. Will take a look tonight.

On Tue, May 31, 2011 at 10:48 AM, jonleighton <
reply@reply.github.com>wrote:

> Thanks for updating your patch.
>
> However I just tried to run the tests and got 10 failures. For example:
>
> ```
>  1) Failure:
> test_last(RelationTest) [test/cases/relations_test.rb:547]:
> <#<Author id: 3, name: "Bob", author_address_id: nil,
> author_address_extra_id: nil, organization_id: nil, owned_essay_id: nil>>
> expected but was
> <#<Author id: 1, name: "David", author_address_id: 1,
> author_address_extra_id: 2, organization_id: "No Such Agency",
> owned_essay_id: "A Modest Proposal">>.
> ```
>
> Could you have another look please?
>
> --
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/1413#issuecomment-1268800
>



-- 
Brian Mathiyakom / brian@rarevisions.net
